text:
I congratulate @ArminLaschet on his election as the new president of our colleages of the @CDU and as the successor of a dear friend of the PP and Spain, Angela Merkel.
CDU and PP are the biggest parties within EPP and we will keep on working together for a stronger Europe.🇪🇺🇪🇸🇩🇪

diputado.grupo: Grupo Parlamentario Popular en el Congreso
